author: IGN
description:
Watch the new trailer for The Relic: First Guardian to learn more about the story and see gameplay from this upcoming dark fantasy action RPG. The Relic: First Guardian will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and Steam in early 2026.

Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness. The fate of the Arsiltus is now in your hands. In this action RPG, you embark on a heroic adventure to save the world in the dark as the last guardian.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Relic: First Guardian - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest action-packed Morbid Metal playtest announcement trailer for this upcoming hack 'n' slash, action rogue-lite, where you can shapeshift into unique characters to slaughter enemies with powerful combos. Morbid Metal launches into Early Access in 2025, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#IGN #gaming
title: Morbid Metal - Official Playtest Announcement Trailer | TGS 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay and the charming world of Threads of Time in this new trailer for the upcoming era-spanning, turn-based RPG. In Threads of Time, players embark on a journey through time, gathering a party of charismatic heroes from across the ages, while uncovering a plot that threatens to unravel the past, present, and future all at once. Threads of Time will be available on PC via Steam and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Threads of Time - Official TGS 2025 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 8 minutes of narrated gameplay from The Relic: First Guardian in this latest trailer for the upcoming action RPG. Journey into the heart of a burning village in this new The Relic: First Guardian trailer, which showcases a deep dive into the dark fantasy world, story inspiration, narrative, a breakdown of boss battles, and a boss fight against an enemy known as Branko, the Bloodstained Shield. The Relic: First Guardian will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and Steam in 2026.

Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness. The fate of the Arsiltus is now in your hands. In this action RPG, you embark on a heroic adventure to save the world in the dark as the last guardian.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Relic: First Guardian - Official 8-Minute Extended Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Blood: Refreshed Supply announcement trailer for this upcoming remaster of the 2.5 FPS shooter game, Blood: Fresh Supply. Blood: Refreshed Supply features new content and community mods. The Blood: Refreshed Supply trailer gives a peek at what you can expect, including a look at various episodes. Blood: Refreshed Supply is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS5), Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam, GOG, Humble Store, and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Blood: Refreshed Supply - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mars Tactics gets a new trailer and a new release window. Check out the latest Mars Tactics for this upcoming retro-style tactical strategy game set during a workers' uprising on the red planet. The new Mars Tactics trailer showcases a fresh look at gameplay and new mechanics, including management and squad customization, and more. Mars Tactics will be available on PC (Steam, GOG, and Epic Games Store) in May 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Mars Tactics - Official Gameplay Trailer #2

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Live Action trailer for Battlefield 6, the first-person action shooter series developed by Battlefield Studios, DICE, and EA. In this latest installment, the squad goes head to head with the Pax Armata threat as they storm a war-torn New York City. Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #Battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Launch Live Action Trailer (Ft. Zac Efron, Jimmy Butler, Morgan Wallen)

author: IGN
description: Meet C4SH, the first of two new Vault Hunters coming to Borderlands 4! C4SH is included in the first Story Pack, Mad Ellie and the Vault of the Damned, which is planned to launch in Q1 2026. Learn about this character in this new Borderlands 4 character teaser for the first-person action looter shooter game. Borderlands 4 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC, with a release on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3.
title: Borderlands 4 - Official 'C4SH' Character Teaser

author: IGN
description:
From portable terrors to playable teasers, these are the best Silent Hill games to chill your spine. 

The Silent Hill series has been at the forefront of feel-bad survival horror storytelling for close to three decades now, and with the success of 2024’s Silent Hill 2 remake and the recent release of Silent Hill f, it felt like the right time to take a look back through Konami’s catalogue of psychological horrors to see how each scarefest stacks up.

Now, admittedly, the series hasn’t been immune to the odd misstep here and there, and there have certainly been periods of time where things have gone more downhill than Silent Hill. Thus you won’t find the likes of forgettable mainline entries like Silent Hill: Homecoming and Silent Hill: Downpour here, or the inappropriately aggressive shoot ‘em up action of Silent Hill: The Arcade, or indeed the co-operative dungeon crawling of Silent Hill: Book of Memories that absolutely nobody asked for. 
With all that in mind, here’s IGN’s picks f
title: The 9 Best Silent Hill Games Ranked

author: IGN
description:
Check out off-screen gameplay of Resident Evil Requiem running on the Switch 2!

We get our first look at how Resident Evil Requiem performs on the Switch 2 in handheld mode at TGS 2025. We got to play the whole TGS demo on the Nintendo console, and now you can see for yourself how Grace Ashcroft handles her terrifying stalker on the Switch 2.
title: Resident Evil Requiem: Switch 2 Gameplay (Off-Screen) | TGS 2025

author: IGN
title: MTG is getting PlayStation cards, including God of War, TLOU, and more! #mtg #magic #playstation
